mapper.select:
SELECT TEI.OPERATORID, TEI.LEAVINGDATE, TEI.PHONE, TEI.SEX, TEI.CODE, TEI.ENTRYDATE, TEI.OFFICIALDATE, TEI.TRIALPERIODENDDATE, TEI.LEAVING, TEI.EMAIL, TEI.NAME, TEI.AGE, TEI.OFFICIAL, TEI.LASTUPDATEPHONELINKINFODATE, TEI.CARDNUM, TEI.RTX FROM OPER_EMPLOYEEINFO TEI WHERE
AND TEI.OPERATORID = #{operatorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_EMPLOYEEINFO ( OPERATORID, LEAVINGDATE, PHONE, SEX, CODE, ENTRYDATE, OFFICIALDATE, TRIALPERIODENDDATE, LEAVING, EMAIL, NAME, AGE, OFFICIAL, LASTUPDATEPHONELINKINFODATE, CARDNUM, RTX ) VALUES ( #{operatorId}, #{leavingDate}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{code}, #{entryDate}, #{officialDate}, #{trialPeriodEndDate}, #{leaving}, #{email}, #{name}, #{age}, #{official}, #{lastUpdatePhoneLinkInfoDate}, #{cardNum}, #{rtx} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_EMPLOYEEINFO WHERE
AND OPERATORID = #{operatorId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_EMPLOYEEINFO
LEAVINGDATE = #{leavingDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PHONE = #{phone,javaType=java.lang.String},
SEX = #{sex,javaType=int},
CODE = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
ENTRYDATE = #{entryDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
OFFICIALDATE = #{officialDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
TRIALPERIODENDDATE = #{trialPeriodEndDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
LEAVING = #{leaving,javaType=boolean},
EMAIL = #{email,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
AGE = #{age,javaType=int},
OFFICIAL = #{official,javaType=boolean},
LASTUPDATEPHONELINKINFODATE = #{lastUpdatePhoneLinkInfoDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
CARDNUM = #{cardNum,javaType=java.lang.String},
RTX = #{rtx,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE OPERATORID = #{operatorId}
